# Introduction {-}
This book contains a set of GSL water quality and nutrient analyses, figures, and code for generating them. All data are drawn from USGS NWIS. Figures are based on data from calendar years 2010 - 2018.  
The source code for generating this book is available via [GitHub repository](https://github.com/jakevl/gsl-nutrients-2019){target="_blank"}.
